GSP32vvmanmhu:10: yatkarma tat prayatnādhārajaṃ yathā - sampratipannaṃ karma,
GSP32vvmanmhu:22: etena vyāptidarśanakāle karmatvakāryatvāderaṅkaratajjananādau kevalasyāpi darśanād vyāptaniścaya iti parākṛtam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:28: 4) kiṃ ca vivādhyāsite pṛthivyudake prayatnavatā ghṛte,
GSP32vvmanmhu:35: tasyāpi sādhane bādhaḥ --- na hi draṣṭurddaṣṭerviparilopo vidyate (bṛha 4.3.23)
GSP32vvmanmhu:44: 7) bauddhaṃ prati īśvarasādhanam --- vivādādhyāsito vikalpaḥ tadatirikte pramā,
GSP32vvmanmhu:111: kalpanayā tatsiddhyabhyupagame vastuno 'sattvena tanmūlasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāsattvaprāptau viśvāsattvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:117: krameṇa kāryakaraṇārhaṃ sthiraṃ tadviparītaṃ kṣaṇikamiti vipratipatterviṣaya udghāṭanīyaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:159: nityatve sati gandhavān pārthivaḥ paramāṇuriti pārthivaparamāṇulakṣaṇam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:169: hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patireka āsīt (ṛ saṃ 10.121.1) iti śruteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:184: tañca pūrvānumānena sādhayituṃ śakyate iti na kaścid doṣaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:198: so 'gnerdevayonyā āhutibhyaḥ sambūya hiraṇyaśarīra ūrdhvaṃ svargalokametītyāgamabādhāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:220: mūrtatve sati tvagindriyānyatve ca sati vyāptyā tvagindriyasaṃyogādhāraḥ śarīram /
GSP32vvmanmhu:324: na ca sādhye bahuvacanakṣepaṇātiprasaṅga iti vācyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:326: na mano manasā saṃyujyate nityadravyatvāditi sādhane dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:330: tathā ca vyomaśivaḥ-- `parakīyena ca manasā sūkṣmaśarīrasthaṃ manaḥ maryāyeṇābhisambandhayati' /
GSP32vvmanmhu:333: na ca vimatipadaṃ viśeṣaguṇarahitadravyābhyāṃ na janyate,
GSP32vvmanmhu:343: tasya ca ko viṣaya iti cintāyāṃ paraśarīraparātmādiṣvatiprasaṅganirākaraṇārthaṃ yatra svayaṃ samavetaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:344: sa eva tasya viṣaya iti vaktavyamiti sthite ---
GSP32vvmanmhu:361: śarīrasya tu yogyānupalabdhyā bādha iti cet /
GSP32vvmanmhu:362: kiṃ cātaḥ? tasyaiva bodhādhāratvāttadabhāve bodhādhārasyāpi abhāva iti cet /
GSP32vvmanmhu:371: tatrāpi suṣuptaśarīrakriyādiṣu vyabhicāraparihārāya jāgrata iti viśeṣaṇaprāpte,
GSP32vvmanmhu:380: anye tu sarvārthavittiṣu grāhakatvena ātmasiddhiriti bruvate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:390: tathā hi --- asti tāvat saugatatacchiṣyāṇāmanātmavāsanāto viṣayebhyo nivṛtiḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:392: na ca te pramāṇamūle eveti niyamaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:396: na cājñānupūrvikā nivṛttiḥ pravṛttirvā svasthasya saṃbhavati /
GSP32vvmanmhu:407: kiṃ ca yogināṃ viyuktāvasthāyāṃ paramāṇurūpādiviṣayacākṣuṣajñānasya pakṣīkāre bhavatāmāśrayaikadeśāsiddhaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:409: na ca mānasapratyakṣatve tatsāmagrayāḥ sarvadā sannihitatvāt suṣuptāvasthāyāmapyātmajñānaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:410: ahaṃ śarīramitivivekāgrahaṇādiṣu ahaṃjñānotpattau bāhyendriyavyatiriktakārakagrāmasyaiva tvayāpi vaktavyatvāttadbalenaiva sarvasyopapatteḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:415: sa ca jñānāśrayo na tu vijñānātmakaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:427: na ca tatra tasya sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti vācyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:434: tathā hi -- ghaṭasaṃyuktena cakṣuṣā janitaṃ jñānaṃ ghaṭamevāvagāhate nārthāntaram,
GSP32vvmanmhu:449: so 'yaṃ piṇyākayācanārthaṃ gatasyāpi śākādinaḥ khārikātailadātṛtvābhyupagama iva /
GSP32vvmanmhu:484: na ca `prakṛṣṭaḥ prakāśaḥ savitā' itivat śabdadvayenāpi eka evārthaḥ pratipādyate iti yuktam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:489: kiṃ ca loke yathā prakṛṣṭaprakāśaśabdayoḥ parasparavyatirekeṇa prayogaḥ --- prakṛṣṭaḥ pumān,
GSP32vvmanmhu:496: mukhye bādhakasambhavāt --- 'aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' (chā u 8.12.1)
GSP32vvmanmhu:513: na hi siddhasya sampādanāya kaścid yatate 'tra /
GSP32vvmanmhu:523: tadanupapattiriti yo 'yaṃ doṣa uktaḥ, sa samānaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:525: na ca tathāvidhasya muktau kathāsambhava iti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:540: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pariṣasvajāte /
GSP32vvmanmhu:543: asyā arthaḥ -- dvau suparṇau ātmānau sayujau = sahavartamānau sakhāyau = ekakāryakāritvena,
GSP32vvmanmhu:544: samānaṃ vṛkṣam = ekaṃ śarīraṃ pariṣasvajāte = āliṅgitavantau /
GSP32vvmanmhu:545: tayorātmanormadhye eko = bhoktā pippalaṃ svādu atti = sukhaviśeṣaṃ bhuṅkte /
GSP32vvmanmhu:546: anaśnan anyaḥ = abhoktā īśvaraḥ abhicākaśīti = sarvato 'tyarthaṃ prakāśate iti vispaṣṭo jīvabrahmaṇorbhedaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:547: ajāmekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīḥ prajāḥ sṛjamānāṃ sarūpāḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:556: na ca sati prayojane nimitte copacāraḥ pravartate,
GSP32vvmanmhu:617: etenāvibhu nityadravyatvādityanenāmahattvasādhane sādhyavyāpakatvāt sparśavattvaṃ nopādhiriti śrīvallabhoktaṃ nirastam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:654: nīlaṃ tama iti pratītiḥ pramāṇamiti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:656: uktaṃ ca śālikanāthenāpi-- apratītāvevāyaṃ pratītibhramo mandānām' (pra paṃ 321) iti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:664: kathaṃ tarhi chāyāyāṃ kṛṣṇasarpabhrama iti cet, doṣavaśāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:680: yathāhuḥ --- añjanapuñja iva śārvaraṃ tama iti bhrāntiprakaraṇe tatra pratibhāsikabādhānupapatteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:683: tamaḥ śabdasya tarhi ko 'rtha iti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:685: ālokaviśeṣe satyapi ālokāntarābhāvasyāpi sambhavāt prayogaprasaṅga iti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:687: asti cet, tamaḥśabdaprayogo 'pyastu, kā no hāniḥ?
GSP32vvmanmhu:689: atha yathā jvālāyā āśutaravināśitvena madhye vināśe vidyamāne 'pi tatsadṛśajvālotpattyā tirohitatvānna nāśavyavahāraḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:692: tattulyaṃ te tarkakarkaśamaterapyuktaparihāraścakṣurālokāsahakṛtaṃ rūpigrāhakaṃ dravyagrāhakendriyatvāttvagvaditi vādinaḥ kālagrāhakaghrāṇenānaikāntikaṃ vyarthaviśeṣaṇatā ca /
GSP32vvmanmhu:694: indriyatvāditi sādhane ghrāṇena prativādinānaikāntikatā vivakṣitā---sādhakatvaṃ ca /
GSP32vvmanmhu:695: na hi tava tathāvidhaṃ tama eveti lakṣaṇaṃ kālāderapi ālokanirapekṣendriyagrāhyatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:696: 5) ālokabhāvasyobhayavādisampratipannatvāt tamaḥśabdavācyatve nāsti vipratipattirnātra prakaraṇaṃ vācyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:756: guṇatve sati cakṣuḥsparśanayormadhye cakṣuṣaiva grahaṇārhaṃ rūpam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:800: asti ca tāvadekaṃ dve trīṇi ityādivyavahāraḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:803: na cābheda ekatvaṃ bhedasamuccayaḥ punaranekatvamiti yuktam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:821: tathāpyananusaṃhitavaijātyādīnāṃ bālagopālādīnāṃ dvāviti vyavahāro 'yaṃ na tannibandhanaḥ dvyaṇukaparimāṇaṃ dvitvasaṃkhyayā vinā na ghaṭate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:833: teṣāṃ jñānaprāgabhāvena vyabhicāraḥ --- guṇatve satīti viśeṣaṇe īśvarecchāyām,
GSP32vvmanmhu:850: 2) tathā vyavahāreṇāpi sādhanīyam --- asti tāvadayaṃ mahān,
GSP32vvmanmhu:895: asamavāyikāraṇatve satīti viśeṣaṇe kevalasaṃyogārambhakeṇa saṃyogena vyabhicārāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:897: na ca saṃyogavyatiriktāsamavāyikāraṇatvāditi saṃyogasyaivāsamavāyikāraṇatvaṃ pratīyate iti bādhitaviṣayatvam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:927: tadasat, ākāśadeśena vibhāgamārabhate karmatvādityapi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:931: uttarasaṃyogādvināśaḥ paścādapi kathaṃ vibhāgapratyayānuvṛtterapi na vācyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:969: 2) prabhākaramate vivādapadaṃ na mānasapratyakṣaṃ jñānatvāditi na sāmpratam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:972: na ca ghaṭaṃ jānāmītyatra kalpanālāghavādekameva jñānaṃ kalpanīyam --- ityarthāpattyupanyāso doṣaḥ syāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:980: na ca jñānaṃ mānasapratyakṣaṃ na bhavati,
GSP32vvmanmhu:989: te tu praṣṭavyāḥ--- kimidaṃ rajatajñānaṃ nāma?
GSP32vvmanmhu:1007: yacca vimataṃ jñānaṃ yathārthaṃ jñānatvāditi bruvate,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1013: bālakasya svātmani vivekāgrahaṇamātrātpravṛttiṃ paśyata uttamavṛddhavākyaprayogānantaraṃ pravarttamānamadhyamavṛddhapravṛtterapi tanmātrapūrvakatvakalpanāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1032: tena cāsmaduktāvāntarabhedasyābhyupagatatvādbhāsarvajñena sahāsmākaṃ nāsti vipratipattiriti nātra prapañcyate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1049: ātmā jñātavya iti vākyaprasiddho yogajo dharmaḥ sarvadarśitvādiphalakaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1053: yadāha bhagavān svayameva-- `śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ gehe yogabhraṣṭo 'bhijāyate' (gī 6.11) iti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1061: bhavati hi vahnimān parvata iti jñānamiti hi dūradeśasthasya kasyāpi matiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1062: tathāpi tena tasyānumititvaṃ kathamavagamyate iti mā vocaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1067: tatsiddhau cānena pramāṇenānvayavyatirekāparanāmnā pratyakṣasāmagrīpraviṣṭenānyena vā siddhiriti yatkiñcidetat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1075: yena vinā yayoḥ sahabhāvādarśanaṃ tatra yena yasya vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1088: vyatirekiṇi tu tadabhāvasya sādhanatvenopayoge tasya vyavacchedakatve nopayoga iti viśeṣaṇavaiyarthyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1103: siddhasādhyatāyāśca parihārārthamāśrayajñānasya ca prathamamākāṃkṣitatvāt prathamataḥ pratijñāvacanam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1106: kāraṇamātrasiddhau viśeṣe jijñāsāyāṃ satyāmākāṃkṣāparyālocanayā hetumātrasyaiva vacanam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1125: prativādinā hi sādhanajijñāsā kṛtā kiṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1133: sambhave vā vastuno dvyātmakatvaṃ ko nivārayet?
GSP32vvmanmhu:1158: yenānaupādhikatve samarthaṃ syādato viśiṣṭaṃ na dūṣaṇamiti cet /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1159: tanna, jalpavādayorhi parasādhanaṃ nivartya svapakṣe sādhanaṃ vācyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1176: na hi kālātyayāpadiṣṭānaikāntikatvaṃ nāma samuditamasti dūṣaṇam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1182: na caitadatiriktaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nāma yat sādhanīyamavaśiṣyate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1188: nanu jñānāvisaṃvāditvagrāhakapratyekṣaṇa tatpūrvakābādhitatatpravṛttibhyāṃ tajjñānaviṣayīkṛtārthasya yathārthasya kriyākāritvena bādhitaviṣayatvādanumānasyaiva durbalatvamiti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1224: nadyāstīre pañca phalāni santīti vākyādarthapratyayo jāyate iti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1225: atra kasya kāraṇatvamiti vibhāvyatām--- na pratyakṣasya,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1228: na hi nadyāstīre pañca phalāni santīti vākyena nadītīraphalasambandhasyāvyabhicaritaḥ sambandhaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1277: ata eva madanumāne ... {One line lost in the MS.} anyathā siddhasādhanatvādakāryatvaṃ copādhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1279: upamānaṃ tu madīyā gauranena sadṛśīti gosadṛśagavayamālokayato 'numānameva /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1290_1: ca sādṛśyasyopalakṣaṇatve nirṇīte tadeva vākyaṃ gavayapadasya gavayatvanimittatvaṃ bodhayati /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1303_0: pramāṇadvayavirodho 'pi sāvakāśānavakāśayoḥ sāvakāśasya viṣayasaṃkoca iti vyāptidarśanavato
GSP32vvmanmhu:1305: vākyamantareṇa vākyānupapatterabhāvāt na hi pīno devadatto divā na bhuṃkte' iti vākyaṃ `rātrau bhuṃkte' iti vākyena vinānupapannam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1307: na hi pacatīti padaṃ pratyakṣādinā nirākāṃkṣamapi tu odanapadeneti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1314: na ca so 'pyasti traikālikabhojananiṣedhe hi sa syāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1346: satyapi duḥkhe tadvyavahāradarśanāt --- santāpavataḥ śītahrade nimagnārdhakāyasya sukhyahamiti mateḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1396: sa ca vegaḥ pratyakṣe dravye pratyakṣeṇaiva gṛhyate,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1414: na ca vācyaṃ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ kṣaṇikasya yāgasya kālāntarabhāvini svarge vināvāntaravyāpāraṃ upapadyate iti madhye 'pūrvasiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1421: kāmādhikāreṣu phalaṃ prati kāraṇasyaiva satastasya niyogaṃ prati viṣayatvābhyupagamāt /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1424: (3 adharmaḥ--) yo brāhmaṇāyāvagurettaṃ śatena yātayāt' (tai saṃ 2.6.10.2)
GSP32vvmanmhu:1441: svapadasya grāhyapadasya na vyāvartanamasti adravyasya bhavatāṃ naye sambandhānabhyupagamāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1453: ātmavyatiriktatve sati indriyāṇāṃ madhye nityenaivādhyakṣīkṛtāyā jāteradhikaraṇatvātsukhavat /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1459: anitya śabdaḥ arasatve satyavayavyagrāhakeṇaiva gṛhyamāṇajāteradhikaraṇatvādgandhavaditi bhāṭṭaṃ prati /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1461: ātmaviśeṣaguṇānyatve sati indriyāṇāṃ madhye nityenaiva gṛhyamāṇatvāditi,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1473: evaṃ vyavasthite pratyakṣeṇāpi sādhyate naṣṭaḥ śabda iti pratīteḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1511: asmākaṃ tu vyāptikāle sattāpratipattau cānyatrāpi siddhiḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1517: samavāyikāraṇatvād ghaṭavat --- atra vipratipattiviṣayasyaiva tathāvidhatvānna sādhye viśeṣaṇopādānād dūṣaṇam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1594: gomayajavṛścikaśarīrasantānavadityanumānenābrāhmaṇapūrvake kvacid brāhmaṇaśabde prāpte na brāhmaṇajanyaśarīranibandhano brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1627: ato na sādhyavikalatā tatra saṃyogasamavāyamātre viprattipattirna dharmiṇi /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1641: āśrayakṛtaḥ svarūpakṛtaḥ kāryakṛto vā virodhaḥ syāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1657: prathame na kadācidapi tayoḥ pratipattiḥ syāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1669: na hi tasyāpratyakṣasya pūrvaṃ svabhāvo nirdhāritaḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1683: yadi nāstīti pratyayavedyamāno 'pi tvayā neṣṭa iti vaktuṃ nocitam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1688: bhūtalamātravyavahārātiriktatve sati bhūtalavyavahāratvāditi mānaṃ bhūtalamiti vyavahāreṇānaikāntikam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1690: bhavati hi ghaṭatadrūpayoḥ sahopalambhe 'pi rūpaṃ ghaṭo na bhavatīti bhinnaścotpādavyavahāraḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1715: brīhīn prokṣatīti dvitīyāyāśca na tatsamavetasaṃskāravācakatvaṃ kriyājanyaphalabhāgitvaṃ ca na tatsamavāyinamākṣipati,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1717: anyathopayuktānāṃ prastarādīnāṃ homenotpādyamānaḥ saṃskāro na teṣāṃ syāt,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1724: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmītyatra prābhākarāṇāṃ naye jñānajanitaphalasya ghaṭe kasyacidabhāvāt tatra kathaṃ karmatvamiti cintyam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1736: jñātatānabhyupagamāt kathaṃ jñānasya viṣayaniyama iti cet,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1768: na ca vivādapadaṃ sākṣātparamparayā vā prakṛtijanyam,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1778: na ca sati kāraṇavyāpāraḥ asārthakatvāditi jātiniyamajñena vyavasthā ghaṭate /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1779: yenaiva pramāṇena ghaṭabhāvasiddhistenaiva pramāṇena yogyānupalabdhyā paṭotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ tantuṣvapi paṭābhāvasiddhiḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1785: kiṃ bahunā ``parasparavirodhe hi na prakārāntarasthitiḥ'' iti nyāyāt padārthāntarāṇāṃ na sambhavaḥ,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1789: tatra hi dravyādināṃ heyopādeyasvarūpeṇa jñāne sati saṃsārasya duḥkhabhūyastvaṃ paśyataḥ sukhamapi duḥkhānuṣaṅgādduḥkhapakṣe nikṣiptam /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1790_0: upaniṣadā ca jñātajīvātmabrahmaṇo vaiśeṣikoktadṛśā bhagavadbhaktimanaskasya sadgurukaṭākṣapātakṣīṇāntarāyasya
GSP32vvmanmhu:1796: na hi siddhārthe kaścitprayatate iti bhavatāmapi avidyānivṛttireva kṛtisādhyā,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1799: ``ānandaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ tacca mokṣe 'bhivyajyate'' iti santoṣajasukhabhiprāyeṇa gauṇyā vṛttyā duḥkhābhāvābhiprāyeṇa vā kathaṃcidguṇavāda iti,
GSP32vvmanmhu:1800: ``aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ'' (chā u 8.12.1)
GSP32vvmanmhu:1805: atra kecit-- duḥkhaparihārārthaṃ jñānasukhayoḥ pūrvaṃ viṣayaviṣayibhāvo 'nupapannaḥ paścādutpādya iti brūyuḥ /
GSP32vvmanmhu:1816: na ca jīvā nityajñānā ātmavadīśvaravaditi sāmpratam,
